@Delete_Repeat Uninstalling then reinstalling this Dont_Starve_Beta_11Dec_setup.exe doesn't affect the in game stats at all. All profile/status information are saved else where. I do not know where exactly but I do know its not in the same folder as your installation's destination folder.

@RivertePireous, I don't know what happed in my post above. Somehow the back slashes didn't register. Here's again:

C:UsersusernameAppDataLocalFLTSteam211670remote


If the back slashes don't register again, here's the structure, and you replaced them with the slashes:

C:*Users*username*AppData*Local*FLT*Steam*211670*remote

@RivertePireous, somehow the back slashes didn't register. Here's the structure of the path:

C:*Users*username*AppData*Local*FLT*Steam*211670*remote
